scripts.start: npm run start:js & npm run start:css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: rm -Rf assets/css && node-sass --output-style compressed --recursive -o assets/css assets/scss && rm -Rf assets/css/abstracts
scripts.build:zip: rm -Rf ../blockify.zip && zip -r ../blockify.zip assets/css/ assets/js/ assets/lang/ assets/svg/ includes/ parts/ patterns/ templates/ vendor/composer vendor/autoload.php vendor/wptt/webfont-loader/wptt-webfont-loader.php vendor/tgmpa/tgm-plugin-activation/languages vendor/tgmpa/tgm-plugin-activation/class-tgm-plugin-activation.php functions.php index.php readme.txt screenshot.png style.css theme.json
